description: SecTool informational drawbacks within the OSRS CMCF are related to instances where information from an artifiact is found missing, irrelevant, not congruent, or not complete based on the information supplied within the artifact.  The informational drawbacks allow for the tracking of these types of informational defficiencies.
name: OSRS SecTool Informational Drawbacks

values.description: The artifact contains SecTool information that is uncertain, indefinite, or unclear of character or meaning.
values.value: OSRS CMCF SecTool Informational Drawback: SecTool Artifact Vague

values.description: The artifact contains SecTool related information that does not align to the current SecTool mapping.
values.value: OSRS CMCF SecTool Informational Drawback: SecTool No Relevant Category

values.description: The artifact relates to SecTool information but does not sufficiently describe the event with enough context to understand which SecTool to map to and so therefore the information that would explain this context is considered missing (or) absent.
values.value: OSRS CMCF SecTool Informational Drawback: SecTool Information Absent
